verses.roman:
anya avatāre saba sainya-śastra saṅge
caitanya-kṛṣṇera sainya aṅga-upāṅge

synonyms: anya—other; avatāre—in incarnations; saba—all; sainya—soldiers; śastra—and weapons; saṅge—along with; caitanya-kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa as Lord Caitanya; sainya—soldiers; aṅga—plenary parts; upāṅge—and associates.
translation: In other incarnations the Lord descended with armies and weapons, but in this incarnation His soldiers are His plenary parts and associates.
